settings.title: GEORGE KRASTEV
settings.text:
Founder and CEO

George Krastev (Georgi Krastev) is originally from Europe and started VoltBike Electric Inc. in 2013 as a side project at his home garage in Coquitlam, BC, Canada. 7 years later, that side project has become a profitable, self-funded company with thousands of riders around North America.

Prior to VoltBike he was a successful web developer for various e-commerce companies the most significant of which is Best Buy Canada. He has a masterâ€™s degree in computer science and technology. He lives in Vancouver, BC with his wife and two daughters.
